mapper.sql: scheduleId, orderId, statmentId, unitPrice, totalPrice, cost, statmentStatus, payStatus, startTime, endTime, clockTime, completedTime, suspendTime, cancelTime, week
mapper.select: SELECT jos.*,d1.INFO AS scheduleStatusInfo,d2.INFO AS payStatusInfo,jsn.nannyId,jni.nannyName,jni.nannyPhone,d3.INFO AS nannyCurrentPayment,jgc.price AS scheduleCurrentPrice,d4.INFO AS scheduleTypeInfo FROM j_order_schedule jos LEFT JOIN j_dict_info d1 ON d1.ID = jos.scheduleStatus LEFT JOIN j_dict_info d2 ON d2.ID = jos.payStatus LEFT JOIN j_schedule_nanny jsn ON jsn.scheduleId = jos.scheduleId LEFT JOIN j_nanny_info jni ON jni.nannyId = jsn.nannyId LEFT JOIN j_dict_info d3 ON d3.ID = jni.nannyLevel LEFT JOIN j_dict_info d4 ON d4.ID = jos.scheduleType LEFT JOIN j_order_contract joc ON joc.orderId = jos.orderId LEFT JOIN j_goods_contract jgc ON jgc.goodsId = joc.goodsId WHERE jos.scheduleId=#{0} AND jos.isDel=16

SELECT j.*,jsn.nannyId,jsn.supplierId,d1.INFO AS scheduleStatusInfo,d2.INFO AS payStatusInfo,d4.INFO AS scheduleTypeInfo FROM j_order_schedule j LEFT JOIN j_schedule_nanny jsn ON jsn.scheduleId=j.scheduleId LEFT JOIN j_order_temp jot ON jot.orderId=j.orderId LEFT JOIN j_dict_info d1 ON d1.ID = j.scheduleStatus LEFT JOIN j_dict_info d2 ON d2.ID = jot.payStatus LEFT JOIN j_dict_info d4 ON d4.ID = j.scheduleType WHERE j.orderId=#{0} AND j.isDel=16 AND j.orderType=164
